mapper.select: SELECT id, book_count, book_name, price, book_img, author, sale_count, book_status FROM bookdb.t_book
SELECT id, book_count, book_name, price, book_img, author, sale_count, book_status FROM bookdb.t_book WHERE book_status = 1 LIMIT #{pageStartRow}, #{pageSize}
SELECT b.book_count - c.buy_count AS remaining_stock FROM bookdb.t_book b join bookdb.t_cart_item c on b.id = c.book where c.id = #{cartItemId}
